title: 悬赏一个插件， BungeeCord多端口多服务器
author: Minecraft小橙
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
bc 本身就能做到监听多个端口

listeners:
- max_players: 1000
  host: 0.0.0.0:3201
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL
  priorities:
  - sc1
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
  motd: 'empty'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25577
#Start listener 2
- max_players: 1000
  host: 0.0.0.0:3202
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL
  priorities:
  - sc2
  forced_hosts:
    factions.md-5.net: factions
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
  motd: 'empty'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25578

复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
ads03829 发表于 2020-1-28 08:41
forge_support: false
connection_throttle_limit: 3
timeout: 30000
这端口要设置成不同的两个，如果 bc 和子服在一台机器上的话
address: localhost:3202
host: 0.0.0.0:3202
